identity.name: Joboost
identity.description: A professional, high-end Career CRM for the French market. Reassuring, ultra-organized, and production-ready.
identity.target_audience: French job seekers, professionals in transition, fresh graduates.

headings.usage: Main headings, section titles, hero text.

body.usage: General UI text, descriptions, form labels.

focus_mode.usage: CV and Cover Letter editing content ONLY.

usage_rules.gradients: AVOID gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
usage_rules.text_contrast: Ensure WCAG AA compliance. Use slate-900 for main text, slate-500 for secondary.
usage_rules.interactive: Hover states should darken/lighten by 10%. Focus rings must be visible (sky-500).

grid_system.marketing: Bento grid style. Asymmetric columns (e.g., col-span-8 + col-span-4).
grid_system.dashboard: Fluid grid with collapsible sidebar. Main content area uses max-w-7xl mx-auto.
grid_system.kanban: Horizontal scrolling container with fixed-width columns (w-80).

containers.card: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-lg shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow
containers.modal: bg-white rounded-xl shadow-2xl border border-slate-100 max-w-2xl w-full
containers.sidebar: w-64 bg-slate-50 border-r border-slate-200 h-screen sticky top-0

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-md px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-900 border border-slate-200 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-md px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:bg-slate-100 hover:text-slate-900 rounded-md px-4 py-2 transition-colors
buttons.destructive: bg-red-50 text-red-600 hover:bg-red-100 rounded-md px-6 py-2.5 font-medium

inputs.default: h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-slate-200 bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm placeholder:text-slate-400 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-sky-500 focus:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50
inputs.focus_mode: border-none shadow-none text-lg bg-transparent focus:ring-0 placeholder:text-slate-300 font-serif

cards.job_card: group relative flex flex-col gap-2 rounded-lg border border-slate-200 bg-white p-4 shadow-sm transition-all hover:shadow-md hover:border-sky-200 cursor-grab active:cursor-grabbing
cards.stat_card: rounded-xl border border-slate-100 bg-white p-6 shadow-sm

badges.default: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border border-slate-200 px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-slate-400 focus:ring-offset-2 text-slate-900

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px or 2px. Consistent sizing (w-4 h-4 for small, w-5 h-5 for default).

transitions.page: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -10 }} transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}

general: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Stick to solid white or slate-50.
Use 'Inter' or 'Manrope' for body text, 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for headings.
Ensure all interactive elements have a data-testid attribute.
Focus Mode must be distraction-free: remove sidebar, header, and footer.
Use 'framer-motion' for smooth transitions, especially in the Kanban board.
accessibility: Ensure text contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1.
All images must have alt text.
Focus states must be clearly visible.
code_style: Use named exports for components, default exports for pages.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install necessary dependencies: `npm install lucide-react framer-motion sonner clsx tailwind-merge`.
2. Configure Tailwind theme to match the colors and fonts defined above.
3. Create the layout components (Sidebar, Header, FocusLayout).
4. Implement the 'Joboost' identity in the Landing Page.
5. Build the Dashboard with the Kanban board using 'dnd-kit' or similar if needed, or simple framer-motion drag.
6. Ensure the 'Focus Mode' uses the specific serif font and minimal layout.
